base.description: append text after the cursor N times

shift.description: append text after the end of the line N times

g.description: print ascii value of character under the cursor

z.description: open a closed fold, close an open fold

zShift.description: open a closed fold or close an open fold recursively

control.description: add N to number at/after cursor

shift.description: cursor N WORDS backward

z.description: redraw, cursor line at bottom of window

base.description: delete Nmove text [into register x] and start insert

shift.description: change from the cursor position to the end of the line, and N-1 more lines [into register x]; synonym for 'c$'

z.description: close a fold

leftSquareBracket.description: cursor N times backwards to start of change

rightSquareBracket.description: cursor N times forward to start of change

shift.description: delete the characters under the cursor until the end of the line and N-1 more lines [into register x]; synonym for 'd$'

g.description: go to definition of word under the cursor in current function

gShift.description: go to definition of word under the cursor in current file

z.description: delete a fold

leftSquareBracket.description: show first #define found in current and included files matching the word under the cursor, start searching at beginning of current file

leftSquareBracketShift.description: list all #defines found in current and included files matching the word under the cursor, start searching at beginning of current file

rightSquareBracket.description: show first #define found in current and included files matching the word under the cursor, start searching at cursor position

rightSquareBracketShift.description: list all #defines found in current and included files matching the word under the cursor, start searching at cursor position

control.description: scroll Down N lines (default: half a screen)

base.description: cursor forward to the end of word N

shift.description: cursor forward to the end of WORD N

g.description: go backwards to the end of the previous word

gShift.description: go backwards to the end of the previous WORD

z.description: when 'wrap' off scroll horizontally to position the cursor at the end (right side) of the screen

control.description: scroll N lines upwards (N lines Extra)

base.description: cursor to Nth occurrence of {char} to the right

shift.description: cursor to the Nth occurrence of {char} to the left

g.description: start editing the file whose name is under the cursor

gShift.description: start editing the file whose name is under the cursor and jump to the line number following the filename.

z.description: create a fold for Nmove text

zShift.description: create a fold for N lines

shift.description: cursor to line N, default last line

g.description: cursor to line N, default first line

z.description: mark word as good spelled word

zShift.description: mark word as good spelled word

control.description: display current file name and position

base.description: cursor N chars to the left

shift.description: cursor to line N from top of screen

g.description: start Select mode

gShift.description: start Select line mode

z.description: when 'wrap' off scroll screen N characters to the right

zShift.description: when 'wrap' off scroll half a screenwidth to the right

base.description: insert text before the cursor N times

shift.description: insert text before the first CHAR on the line N times

g.description: like 'i', but first move to the '^ mark

gShift.description: like 'I', but always start in column 1

z.description: toggle 'foldenable'

leftSquareBracket.description: show first line found in current and included files that contains the word under the cursor, start searching at beginning of current file

leftSquareBracketShift.description: list all lines found in current and included files that contain the word under the cursor, start searching at beginning of current file

rightSquareBracket.description: show first line found in current and included files that contains the word under the cursor, start searching at cursor position

rightSquareBracketShift.description: list all lines found in current and included files that contain the word under the cursor, start searching at cursor position

shift.description: join N lines; default is 2

g.description: like 'j', but when 'wrap' on go N screen lines down

gShift.description: join lines without inserting space

z.description: move to the start of the next fold

shift.description: lookup Keyword under the cursor with 'keywordprg'

g.description: like 'k', but when 'wrap' on go N screen lines up

z.description: move to the end of the previous fold

base.description: cursor N chars to the right

shift.description: cursor to line N from bottom of screen

z.description: when 'wrap' off scroll screen N characters to the left

zShift.description: when 'wrap' off scroll half a screenwidth to the left

shift.description: cursor to middle line of screen

g.description: go to character at middle of the screenline

z.description: subtract one from 'foldlevel'

leftSquareBracket.description: cursor N times back to start of member function

rightSquareBracket.description: cursor N times forward to end of member function

base.description: repeat the latest '/' or '?' N times

shift.description: repeat the latest '/' or '?' N times in opposite direction

g.description: find the next match with the last used search pattern and Visually select it

gShift.description: find the previous match with the last used search pattern and Visually select it

z.description: reset 'foldenable'

base.description: begin a new line below the cursor and insert text, repeat N times

shift.description: begin a new line above the cursor and insert text, repeat N times

g.description: cursor to byte N in the buffer

z.description: open fold

control.description: go to N older entry in jump list

base.description: put the text [from register x] after the cursor N times

shift.description: put the text [from register x] before the cursor N times

g.description: put the text [from register x] after the cursor N times, leave the cursor after it

gShift.description: put the text [from register x] before the cursor N times, leave the cursor after it

leftSquareBracket.description: like 'P', but adjust indent to current line

rightSquareBracket.description: like 'p', but adjust indent to current line

base.description: record typed characters into named register {0-9a-zA-Z}(uppercase to append). There are three special cases (q: q/ q?)

shift.description: to 'Ex' mode

g.description: format Nmove text

gShift.description: switch to 'Ex' mode with Vim editing

shift.description: enter replace mode: overtype existing characters, repeat the entered text N-1 times

g.description: virtual replace N chars with {char}

gShift.description: enter Virtual Replace mode

z.description: add one to 'foldlevel'

control.description: redo changes which were undone with 'u'

base.description: (substitute) delete N characters [into register x] and start insert

shift.description: delete N lines [into register x] and start insert; synonym for 'cc'.

g.description: go to sleep for N seconds (default 1)

z.description: when 'wrap' off scroll horizontally to position the cursor at the start (left side) of the screen

leftSquareBracket.description: move to the previous misspelled word

base.description: cursor till before Nth occurrence of {char} to the right

shift.description: cursor till after Nth occurrence of {char} to the left

g.description: go to the next tab page

gShift.description: go to the previous tab page

z.description: redraw, cursor line at top of window

control.description: jump to N older Tag in tag list

shift.description: undo all latest changes on one line

g.description: make Nmove text lowercase

gShift.description: make Nmove text uppercase

control.description: scroll N lines Upwards (default: half a screen)

shift.description: linewise Visual mode

g.description: reselect the previous Visual area

gShift.description: don't reselect the previous Visual area when executing a mapping or menu in Select mode

z.description: open enough folds to view the cursor line

shift.description: cursor N WORDS forward

g.description: format Nmove text and keep cursor

z.description: mark word as wrong (bad) spelled word

zShift.description: mark word as wrong (bad) spelled word

base.description: delete N characters under and after the cursor [into register x]

shift.description: delete N characters before the cursor [into register x]

z.description: re-apply 'foldlevel' and do 'zv'

control.description: subtract N from number at/after cursor

shift.description: yank N lines [into register x]; synonym for 'yy'
extended commands starting with 'Z'

z.description: redraw, cursor line at center of window

ZShift.description: store current file if modified, and exit

leftSquareBracket.description: move to start of open fold

rightSquareBracket.description: move to end of open fold

shift.description: 'tildeop' off: switch case of N characters under cursor and move the cursor N characters to the right

g.description: like ` but without changing the jumplist

gShift.description: swap case for Nmove text

shift.description: filter Nmove text through the {filter} command
execute the contents of register {a-z} N times

gShift.description: call 'operatorfunc'

shift.description: search backward for the Nth occurrence of the ident under the cursor

gShift.description: like '#', but without using '\<' and '\>'

leftSquareBracketShift.description: cursor to N previous unmatched #if, #else or #ifdef

rightSquareBracketShift.description: cursor to N next unmatched #endif or #else

shift.description: cursor to the end of Nth next line

gShift.description: when 'wrap' off go to rightmost character of the current line that is on the screen; when 'wrap' on go to the rightmost character of the current screen line

shift.description: find the next (curly/square) bracket on this line and go to its match, or go to matching comment bracket, or go to matching preprocessor directive.
cursor to the first CHAR of the line

gShift.description: when 'wrap' off go to leftmost non-white character of the current line that is on the screen; when 'wrap' on go to the leftmost non-white character of the current screen line

zShift.description: cursor on line N (default line above window), otherwise like 'z-'

shift.description: repeat last :s

gShift.description: repeat last ':s' on all lines

shift.description: search forward for the Nth occurrence of the ident under the cursor

g.description: print hex value of bytes used in UTF-8 character under the cursor

gShift.description: like '*', but without using '\<' and '\>'

shift.description: cursor N sentences backward

leftSquareBracketShift.description: cursor N times back to unmatched '('

base.description: cursor to the first char of the line

shift.description: cursor N sentences forward

g.description: when 'wrap' off go to leftmost character of the current line that is on the screen; when 'wrap' on go to the leftmost character of the current screen line

rightSquareBracketShift.description: cursor N times forward to unmatched ')'

base.description: cursor to the first CHAR N lines higher

shift.description: cursor to the first CHAR N - 1 lines lower

g.description: go to older text state N times

gShift.description: cursor to the last CHAR N - 1 lines lower

z.description: redraw, cursor line at bottom of window, cursor on first non-blank

shift.description: same as <CR>

gShift.description: go to newer text state N times

z.description: give spelling suggestions

zShift.description: cursor on line N (default line below window), otherwise like 'z<CR>'

base.description: go to N newer entry in jump list

shift.description: cursor N paragraphs backward

leftSquareBracketShift.description: cursor N times back to unmatched '{'

shift.description: cursor N paragraphs forward

g.description: :tselect on the tag under the cursor

rightSquareBracketShift.description: cursor N times forward to unmatched '}'

shift.description: cursor to column N

base.description: repeat latest f, t, F or T N times

shift.description: start entering an Ex command

g.description: go to N older position in change list

base.description: cursor to the first CHAR on the line with mark {a-zA-Z0-9}

shift.description: use register {a-zA-Z0-9.%#:-"} for next delete, yank or put (uppercase to append) ({.%#:} only work with put)

g.description: like ' but without changing the jumplist

leftSquareBracket.description: cursor to previous lowercase mark, on first non-blank

rightSquareBracket.description: cursor to next lowercase mark, on first non-blank

base.description: cursor to the first CHAR N lines lower

z.description: redraw, cursor line to top of window, cursor on first non-blank

base.description: repeat latest f, t, F or T in opposite direction N times

shift.description: shift Nmove lines one 'shiftwidth' leftwards

g.description: go to N newer position in change list

gShift.description: display previous command output

base.description: repeat last change with count replaced with N

shift.description: shift Nmove lines one 'shiftwidth' rightwards

z.description: redraw, cursor line to center of window, cursor on first non-blank

base.description: search forward for the Nth occurrence of {pattern}

shift.description: search backward for the Nth previous occurrence of {pattern}

gShift.description: rot13 encoding operator

leftSquareBracket.description: cursor to N previous start of a C comment

rightSquareBracket.description: cursor to N next end of a C comment
